page.title: 09HOUSING IN INCE BLUNDELL
page.content: The housing in Ince Blundell is of three main types semi-detached cottages and houses ,modern terraced houses and semi-detached bungalows.Most of the cottages were originally owned by the{Weld-Blundell} estates. The semi-detached and terraced houses which were originally council houses are now privately owned.The bungalows were built in the 60's and many are the homes of retired people. There are also some interesting detached houses , including 6 farmhouses. All these are privately owned. Half the people surveyed lived in the village because of family ties. More than half had lived there over 20 years.
